meanings: (자격·재능·자질 등을) possess, be equipped (to do); (선천적으로) be endowed with

meanings.meaning: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
what it would take (for one to do something)

vlive.korean: 이 다섯 가지를 갖춰야 진정한 펜타곤이 될 수 있지. You can only be PENTAGON if you have these five things. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [존잘러스2] 펜타곤 키노&우석 편
vlive.english: You can only be PENTAGON if you have these five things.

vlive.korean: 이제 외관을 갖춰야 되거든요. Now the outside. 듣기 View video BTOB : <일훈 'Fancy Shoes' 런칭 전야제>
모두 안전장비를 갖춰야 해요. Please get equipped with safety devices. 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 블핑하우스 (BLACKPINK HOUSE) EP.5-4
vlive.english: Please get equipped with safety devices.

vlive.korean: 입고? - 입고. 최소한의 예의는 갖춰야 하니까. With clothes on? - Sure. That's a manner. 듣기 View video WINNER : 승승TV Ep.6 <위너홀로집에>
vlive.english: With clothes on? - Sure. That's a manner.

vlive.korean: 그 당시 중세 성당이 의도했던 공간의 갖춰야 될 덕목들이 잘 드러났다고 할 수 있죠. displays the virtues that were intended by medieval cathedrals. 듣기 View video V BOOKS : <난처한 미술이야기> 양정무 교수의 '유럽 여행 제대로 즐기는 법' 생중계
vlive.english: displays the virtues that were intended by medieval cathedrals.

examples.korean: All students should be numerate and literate when they leave school. 발음듣기 모든 학생들은 학교를 졸업할 때 산술 능력과 읽고 쓰는 능력을 갖춰야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All students should be numerate and literate when they leave school. 발음

examples.korean: Garment technologists should have strong technical knowledge about clothing construction. 발음듣기 의복 기술 전문가는 의류 구성에 대한 탄탄한 기술적 지식을 갖춰야 합니다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Garment technologists should have strong technical knowledge about clothing construction. 발음

examples.korean: You are supposed to acquire computer skills for researching and presenting information. 발음듣기 정보를 조사하고 발표하기 위해서 컴퓨터 실력을 갖춰야 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: You are supposed to acquire computer skills for researching and presenting information. 발음

examples.korean: People ask me what it takes to be a leader. 발음듣기 사람들은 제게 리더가 되기 위해 갖춰야 할 자질이 무엇인지 묻습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: People ask me what it takes to be a leader. 발음

examples.korean: The virtues of a good teacher include honesty and integrity. 발음듣기 교사로서 갖춰야 할 덕목은 정직과 청렴이다 Neungyule
examples.english: The virtues of a good teacher include honesty and integrity. 발음
